metadata.title: CVE-2019-15163 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: rpcapd/daemon.c in libpcap before 1.9.1 allows attackers to cause a denialof service (NULL pointer dereference and daemon crash) if a crypt() callfails.

criterions.comment: libpcap: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
